title: Chicken with collard greens, tomato and white beans
directions: Preheat the oven to 200 Â° C. Grease the baking dish with oil.

Cut the chicken into pieces of 1 x 1 cm. Crush the garlic cloves, peel and chop them coarsely. Drain the beans. Mix the chicken, kale, beans, diced tomatoes, thyme and garlic in the dish. Season with pepper and salt. Add 20 min. In the oven. Spoon arranged.
Divide the chicken, vegetables and beans among 4 plates and sprinkle with the almonds.
